response.summary: Mechanical engineer with knowledge in areas of mechanical design, engineering drawing, electronics, prototype development, materials engineering and manufacturing processes, with programming skills, solid knowledge of Excel and software management focused on design and manufacturing. I am interested in the areas of production and plant maintenance, specifically in continuous improvement methods and production management. On a personal level, I am characterized by principles that define me as a reliable, integrated and honest person. I have the ability to work in a team and I have a great desire to face new challenges at a personal and professional level.
response.skills: Comunicación asertiva, Planificación de proyectos, Comunicación, Autogestión, Atención al detalle, Toma de decisiones, AutoCAD, Planificación, seguimiento y control de operaciones de producción industrial con Excel, Liderazgo, Trabajo en equipo, Capacidad de análisis, Análisis de datos, Responsabilidad, Planificación estratégica, Programacion, Microsoft Office, Python, Matlab, CATIA, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
HVAC Systems Design Engineer in the residential, commercial and hospital sector, ensuring maximum energy efficiency and user comfort in every project. Among my main functions are:

- Calculation of thermal loads
- Selection of suitable ventilation, refrigeration and heating equipment
- Layout of ductwork, refrigeration and control networks
- Detail plan drawing
- Quantity takeoff
- BIM modeling in Revit.
profile_positions.title: HVAC Design Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design of air conditioning and mechanical ventilation systems focused on critical environments in the pharmaceutical industry under ASHRAE standards with a BIM approach.
profile_positions.title: Projects Engineer (HVAC)

profile_positions.description: Maintenance intern responsible for leading the pilot implementation of autonomous maintenance in critical equipment in the production area following the guidelines of the VPO management system.
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Intern

company.name: Mitsubishi Electric de Colombia
company.description: En Mitsubishi Electric de Colombia trabajamos desde hace medio siglo para marcar la diferencia en seguridad y calidad en el mercado de ascensores y escaleras eléctricas, sistemas de aire acondicionado y otros equipos. Brindamos productos y servicios a nuestros clientes y usuarios que los hacen vivir experiencias únicas. Buscamos la sostenibilidad y para lograrla, contribuimos con el desarrollo de la próxima generación, damos respuesta a las necesidades sociales en los campos de bienestar social y preservamos el medio ambiente. Este es el motor que nos mueve día a día para sorprender a Colombia, Suramérica y el Caribe con lo que somos capaces de hacer.
